Simkl Search Extension: Supercharge Your Online Searches

Unlock a more efficient and personalized search experience with the Simkl Search Extension! Whether you're hunting for TV shows, movies, anime, or general information across various platforms, this extension makes it faster and easier than ever.

Key Features:
- Customizable Search Engines: Personalize your search by adding, organizing, and managing custom search engines. Search across your favorite platforms!
- Quick ChatGPT Access: Utilize ChatGPT features like summarizing, translating, and paraphrasing directly from your context menu.
- Group & Organize: Create groups to categorize search engines by type (e.g., TV shows, movies, databases like Simkl, IMDB, etc). You can even add separators to visually organize your list for easier navigation.
- Search Everywhere: Use the “Search Everywhere” option within a group to run the same query across multiple search engines at once, opening results in separate tabs for fast comparison.
- One-Click Search from Context Menu: Highlight any text, right-click, and quickly search it on any of your configured search engines directly from the context menu.
- Backup & Sync: Export your search engine settings or sync them across devices using Chrome Sync to keep your customized search experience consistent anywhere you browse.
- Cloud Sync: Seamlessly sync your search engines with Chrome to keep your settings backed up and accessible across all your devices.

Why Choose Simkl Search Extension?
This extension is perfect for researchers, TV show and movie enthusiasts, students, or anyone who frequently searches the web across multiple platforms. Save time, organize your search engines, and get the most relevant results faster.

Download the Simkl Search Extension today and simplify your web searches!
